message.content:
1. Reverse cholesterol transport (RCT) is a mechanism.
2. RCT is critical to the anti-atherogenic property of HDL.
3. HDL has an anti-atherogenic property.

messages.content:
Statement: Reverse cholesterol transport (RCT) is a mechanism critical to the anti-atherogenic property of HDL.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
